english.segment1: You've made the mystery of life quite clear to me. The sparkling truth revealed is so satisfying. This treasure of life that You bring gives me this passion to sing. I need You, I run into Your arms
english.segment2: Hope of the world, oh I come to You. Light in the darkness. You're shining Your heart in me
english.segment3: I promise, promise, to eternity. I'll live and die to know You, to love You. For I've found what I've been looking for
english.segment4: I sense You've known all along this need in me to belong. Your wings of grace completely swept me away. True love is possible I know, just look at me, does it show?. I long for the day that I see You face to face
english.segment5: Hope of the world, oh I come to You. Light in the darkness. You're shining Your heart in me
english.segment6: Desire of all nations we come. Strength of my life, You are shining Your heart in me
